item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司被欧盟罚款 1.2 亿欧元，这是欧盟首次根据内容法进行处罚
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交网络因违反欧盟有争议的内容节制法而被处以低于预期的 1.2 亿欧元（1.4 亿美元）罚款，此举仍将在言论自由和技术监管问题上引发与白宫的紧张关系。【原文：Elon Musk’s X social network was slapped with a lower-than-expected €120 million ($140 million) fine for violating the European Union’s controversial content-moderation law, in a move still set to raise tensions with the White House over free speech and tech regulation.】

item.title: 美国银行哈特内特警告美联储鸽派降息影响股市反弹
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的策略师认为，美联储对经济过于谨慎的展望可能会危及股市年底的涨势。【原文：The year-end rally in equities is at risk from a Federal Reserve outlook that’s too cautious on the economy, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 美联储 12 月降息后，经济学家认为 2026 年将有两次降息
item.description: 据彭博社调查的经济学家称，美联储官员下周将投票决定再次降息，以防范劳动力市场急剧恶化的风险上升。【原文：Federal Reserve officials will vote to cut interest rates again next week to safeguard against rising risks of a sharp deterioration in the labor market, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 马克龙表示将推动欧盟优先发展电动汽车
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）表示，在布鲁塞尔为汽车行业起草新提案时，他将支持电动汽车的 "欧洲优先选择"。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron said he’ll back a “European preference” for electric vehicles as Brussels draws up new proposals for the auto industry.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利分析师称空头袭击后买入 Trustpilot
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的一位分析师正在敦促客户买入Trustpilot Group Plc的股票，一天前，这家消费者点评公司在做空者的攻击下遭遇了创纪录的股价下跌。【原文：A Morgan Stanley analyst is urging clients to buy shares of Trustpilot Group Plc a day after the consumer-review company suffered a record share-price drop in the wake of a short-seller attack.】

item.title: 尼日利亚交易所寻求推迟征收导致股市暴跌的税收
item.description: 尼日利亚交易所寻求暂停将于 1 月生效的资本利得税上调计划，因为在多年的非正统政策使外国投资者望而却步之后，人们担心这将破坏市场复苏。【原文：The Nigerian Exchange seeks the suspension of a planned increase in capital gains tax that comes into effect in January due to fears it will derail the market recovery after years of unorthodox policies deterred foreign investors.】

item.title: 土耳其计划在巴基斯坦建立无人机设施，推动全球防务发展
item.description: 据熟知内情的土耳其官员透露，土耳其计划在巴基斯坦建立一个组装作战无人机的工厂，这是安卡拉推动其国防工业在国际市场上发展的一部分。【原文：Turkey plans to set up a facility in Pakistan to assemble combat drones, part of Ankara’s drive to boost its defense industry in international markets, according to Turkish officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百年道氏理论闪现美国股市反弹的看涨信号
item.description: 股票交易者在寻找股市将继续大幅上涨的迹象时，可能会从那些在美国公路、铁路和水路上运输货物的公司身上得到启示。【原文：Equity traders looking for signs that a blistering stock-market advance is set to continue may take their cue from the companies that move goods across America’s roads, rails and waterways.】

item.title: 欧元区内需增长超过最初预期
item.description: 得益于投资和消费的增长，欧元区第三季度的经济增长超过了最初的报告。【原文：The euro-area economy expanded more than initially reported in the third quarter thanks to boosts in investment and consumption.】

item.title: UCB 因皮肤病药物需求旺盛而业绩上升
item.description: 比利时生物制药公司 UCB SA 上调了今年的业绩展望，让投资者对其最重要的药品之一的需求放心，此后该公司股价创下九周多以来的最大涨幅。【原文：UCB SA shares surged the most in more than nine weeks after the Belgian biopharmaceutical company upgraded its outlook for the year, reassuring investors about the demand for one of its most important medicines.】

item.title: 摩根大通加入牛股行列，格雷戈斯股价大涨
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）称，这家陷入困境的英国烘焙公司已做好反弹的准备后，Greggs Plc 的股价周五创下了两个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：Greggs Plc shares jumped the most in two months Friday after JPMorgan Chase & Co. said the struggling UK bakery firm is primed for a rebound.】

item.title: 无论乌克兰和平与否，莱茵金属都将迎来长达十年的繁荣期
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司首席执行官 Armin Papperger 表示，尽管他希望乌克兰实现和平，但这对公司业务的影响 "绝对为零"。【原文：Rheinmetall AG Chief Executive Officer Armin Papperger said that although he wishes for peace in Ukraine, it will have “absolutely zero impact” on the company’s business.】

item.title: Cloudflare 称已修复导致银行网站运行缓慢的故障，Zoom
item.description: Cloudflare 公司表示，它已经修复了导致几家银行、Shopify、Zoom 和 LinkedIn 网站周五瘫痪的问题。【原文：Cloudflare Inc. said it has fixed a problem that led to the websites for several banks, Shopify, Zoom and LinkedIn to go down Friday.】

item.title: 花旗集团预测欧洲股市反弹的策略师认为盈利存在风险
item.description: 一年前，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.现在，随着股市接近四年来的最佳表现，这位策略师警告说，进一步的涨势取决于在刀刃上平衡的盈利前景。【原文：A year ago, Citigroup Inc.’s Beata Manthey was a rare advocate of European equities. Now, as stocks close in on their best performance in four years, the strategist warns further gains hinge on an earnings outlook balanced on a knife edge.】

item.title: 克里斯蒂亚诺-罗纳尔多投资 Perplexity AI，建立合作伙伴关系
item.description: 亿万富翁足球运动员克里斯蒂亚诺-罗纳尔多（Cristiano Ronaldo）入股 Perplexity AI 公司，这标志着葡萄牙球星迄今为止最引人注目的投资。【原文：Billionaire footballer Cristiano Ronaldo has taken a stake in Perplexity AI Inc., marking the Portuguese star’s most high-profile investment to date.】

item.title: 据说加密货币交易所 HashKey 将于下周接受投资者的香港 IPO 订单
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，加密货币交易所运营商 HashKey Holdings Ltd. 最快将于下周开始接受投资者的香港首次公开募股订单。【原文：Cryptocurrency-exchange operator HashKey Holdings Ltd. is set to start taking investor orders as soon as next week for its Hong Kong initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 空头支票公司 Mayflower 在伦敦首次公开募股 5 亿美元后首次亮相
item.description: 由 Toms Capital 的 Noam Gottesman 和前雷曼兄弟银行家 Jeremy Isaacs 支持的投资公司 Mayflower Acquisition Ltd. 周五上午开始在伦敦交易，为伦敦交易所的年末活动增添了一抹亮色。【原文：Mayflower Acquisition Ltd., an investment vehicle backed by Toms Capital’s Noam Gottesman and former Lehman Brothers banker Jeremy Isaacs, began trading in London on Friday morning, adding to a spurt of year-end activity for the bourse.】

item.title: 奇货可居：Affirm 的 Max Levchin 谈 BNPL 如何真正发挥作用（播客）
item.description: 马克斯-莱夫钦（Max Levchin）可能是最了解在线支付的人。他是最初的 "PayPal 黑手党 "成员，后来成为 Affirm 的联合创始人兼首席执行官，Affirm 是 "先买后付 "行业中价值 220 亿美元的参与者，希望借此颠覆现有的信用卡公司。虽然 BNPL 正在蓬勃发展，但人们对它如何运作、如何赚钱以及其活动的透明度仍有很多困惑。在本期节目中，我们将与 Max 谈论他创办公司的初衷和原因。【原文：Max Levchin probably knows as much about online payments as anyone. He was part of the original “PayPal mafia,” before going on to become co-founder and CEO of Affirm, the $22 billion player in the Buy Now, Pay Later industry that’s hoping to disrupt the incumbent credit card companies. While BNPL is booming, there is still a lot of confusion about how it works, how it makes money, and how transparent its activities are. On this episode, we speak with Max about why he started his company and why】

item.title: 印度央行回击汇率政策调整猜测
item.description: 印度央行行长桑贾伊-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）表示，印度管理汇率波动的政策没有改变，他驳斥了有关印度央行本周保持观望、任由卢比屡创新低、从而允许汇率大幅波动的猜测。【原文：India’s policy of managing the exchange rate’s volatility hasn’t changed, central bank Governor Sanjay Malhotra said, quashing speculation that it was allowing large swings by staying on the sidelines and letting the rupee plumb new record lows this week.】

item.title: 英国 FCA 驳回对预算案进行市场滥用调查的呼吁
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）告诉英国立法者，它不会调查围绕英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）预算案发布信息的行为，因为反对党认为这可能构成市场滥用。【原文：The Financial Conduct Authority has told British lawmakers it is not investigating the release of information around Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget, after opposition parties suggested it could have amounted to market abuse.】

item.title: 国泰君安寄望 ETF 和替代品深化沙特市场策略
item.description: 国泰君安公司（State Street Corp. ）正在深化其在沙特阿拉伯的扩张，因为该公司希望抓住对交易所交易基金的蓬勃需求以及包括家族办公室在内的客户对另类投资日益增长的需求。【原文：State Street Corp. is deepening its expansion in Saudi Arabia as it looks to cash in on booming demand for exchange-traded funds and growing appetite for alternative investments from clients including family offices.】

item.title: 空客本月需交付 133 架喷气机才能实现年度目标
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）需要在本月交付 133 架喷气式飞机，才能实现其年度目标，因为该飞机制造商正在努力应对安全检查和软件故障，这些问题可能会转移飞机制造的资源。【原文：Airbus SE needs to deliver 133 jets this month in order to hit its annual target as the planemaker grapples with safety inspections and a software hitch that risk diverting resources away from aircraft building.】

item.title: 贝莱德比特币 ETF 资金流出创纪录，损失 27 亿美元
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的iShares比特币信托基金创下了自2024年1月首次推出以来最长的连续每周提现记录，这表明，即使价格趋于稳定，机构对世界上最大加密货币的兴趣依然低迷。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s iShares Bitcoin Trust recorded its longest streak of weekly withdrawals since debuting in January 2024, in a sign that institutional appetite for the world’s largest cryptocurrency remains subdued even as prices stabilize.】

item.title: Visa 将欧洲总部迁至伦敦金丝雀码头
item.description: Visa 公司已同意将其欧洲总部迁至金丝雀码头，这是伦敦东部金融区的最新胜利。【原文：Visa Inc. has agreed to a deal to move its European headquarters to Canary Wharf, the latest win for the east London financial district.】

item.title: 奢侈品股票 "排毒 "后有望迎来更强劲的一年
item.description: 欧洲奢侈品行业下半年的涨势有望延续到新的一年，因为有迹象表明，欧洲大陆的旗舰股票行业将迎来更好的发展。【原文：Optimism is building that a second-half rally in Europe’s luxury-goods sector can extend into the new year as signs point to better times for the continent’s flagship equity sector.】

item.title: 南非农业企业在经历两个季度的下滑后情绪回升
item.description: 由于良好的天气条件和强劲的出口支撑了更为积极的前景，南非农业企业的情绪在三个季度以来首次出现上升。【原文：Sentiment among South Africa’s agricultural businesses rose for the first time in three quarters as favorable weather conditions and strong exports supported a more positive outlook.】
